hero.headline: Achieve confidence, comfort, and clarity in English.
hero.subhead: Private English and Coding classes for all studentsâ€”from beginner to advanced. Improve your English and learn new skills to help you achieve your goals.

classes.headline: English classes for every age and every level.
classes.description: Choose the classes designed for your age, ability, and learning goals.
classes.kids_description: Learn English naturally and master the fundamentals for success in school and life.
classes.adults_description: Have natural conversations, explore global topics, and improve your grammar.
classes.business_description: Push your career success with classes classes for conversation, business writing, and public speaking.
classes.test_description: Prepare for your upcoming tests and achieve your best score.

coming.headline: Coding Classes Coming Soon
coming.one: I'm working to offer coding classes focused on building products that solve real world problems. Lessons are in English and will teach teamwork, product development, coding skills, task automation, and how to use AI to be competitive in the modern economy.
coming.two: If you are interested in Coding Classes for yourself, your teenagers, or someone you know, please sign up to be notified using the form below. I look forward to building something amazing with you.
coming.placeholder: Enter your email for coding class notifications.
coming.disclaimer: *We will only contact you with new information directly related to Coding classes.

contact.headline: Contact Me To Arrange Your First Class
contact.description: Scan the Line QR code or fill out the email form below. I am available between 8 am and 8 pm everyday to respond to your inquiries. I will do my best to reply to you within 2 hours of messaging me.
contact.form_message: Write a short message about what class you want.
